settings.text:
"Alnest by Veronika Yakymiv, a Ukrainian brand of designer clothing, was founded in 2020 in the heart of Ukrainian culture, in the city of Lviv. Each collection emphasizes the importance and priority of family values, which the brand reflects in its products.

'The world is constantly changing and transforming, and the world of fashion does so every season. Therefore, Alnest's main goal is to transform a young child into a successful, confident, adult individual through self-expression. Each item we create involves handiwork, experience, culture, and the heritage of previous generations, yet through the prism of modern trends and global demands.'

For the Alnest brand, nothing is impossible, which is why we adapt our products to various body types and measurements. This collaboration between the client and the brand brings a unique kind of pleasure, and the result is always a mutual reward."
